activity: Hand held screw driving using battery powered Impact Driver into various materials such as plastic, wood and metal.

before: Tie back or remove loose clothing.
during: Keep hands away from rotating parts.
after: If battery is low or depleted return it to the charger.
Do not touch removed screws immediately after operation as it may be hot.

controls: Loose clothing and long hair to be tied back.
Removed screws to be left to cool after removal.
